name: 有機化學實驗
description: 訓練學生有機化學實驗操作的技巧，並培養實驗正確的實驗態度以及獨立思考和解決問題能力。此外，如何使學生學習撰寫有機化學實驗記錄和報告亦是此課程重要一環。評量方式以實驗操作，報告，實驗態度，出席率，值日組工作及考試為主。
goals: 訓練學生有機化學實驗操作的技巧，並培養實驗正確的實驗態度以及獨立思考和解決問題能力
syllabus:
**授課方式：****16+2****週**

Exp.1 Simple Distillation of Ethanol Compound

Exp.2 Extraction with Solvents: Separation of Benzoic Acid and Acetanilide

### Exp.3 Chromatography: 1. TLC

Synthesis α-methylbenzyl alcohol from Acetophenone

### Exp.4 Chromatography: 2. FC

Improvements in the Separation of _β_\-Carotene and Lycopene by Column Chromatography

Exp.5 Identification of Organic Compounds:

A.Hydrocarbons: (1)Permanganate Test(Baeyer Test) (2)Bromine Test(demo.)

B.Alkyl Halides: (1)Alcoholic Silver Nitrate (2)Sodium Iodide in Acetone

Exp.6 Functional Group Identification (alcohols):

A.Ritter Test B.Lucas Test C.Iodoform Test

Exp.7 Functional Group Identification (Ald & Ketones):

A. 2,4-Dinitrophenylhydrazone Test

B. Tollen’s Reagent (Silver mirror Test)

C. Schiff’s Fuchsin Test

Exp.8 Preparation of Poly Vinyl Alcohol

Exp.9 Preparation of Azo Dyes: Methyl Orange Ⅱ

Exp.10 Unknown Sugar Solution Test

methodologies.note: 撰寫有機化學實驗記錄和報告

grading.note: 實驗操作與態度、值日組工作
